July 7, 2019 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Best Soloist - Hepworth Cornet Best Band on the March - Hammonds Best Match - Hepworth Best Hymn Tune - Hepworth Best Deportment - Uppermill Best Principal Cornet - Hepworth Best Euphonium - Hepworth Best Trombones - Hepworth Best Soprano - Skelmanthorpe Best Trombones on the March - Hepworth Best 1st Section - Blackburn & Darwen Best 2nd Section - Meltham & Meltham Mills Best 3rd Section - Uppermill Best 4th Section - Skelmersdale Best 4th Section Hymn - Skelmersdale Best Youth - Elland Best Youth Soloist - Elland Best Youth Deportment - Elland Youngest Player - Wardle Junior Blast Best Basses - Hammonds 2nd Youth Band - Bradford Youth
